ygData.subject: no CrawlURI error
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi, I get these errors in a job last night. The Heritrix version is 3.1.1 After these errors occured the job was paused by heritrix. Does anyone have an idea

Hi,

I get these errors in a job last night. The Heritrix version is 3.1.1
After these errors occured the job was paused by heritrix.

Does anyone have an idea why this error occures and can give me maybe a 
hint about a possible problem?
I just can see here that a thread is waiting too long to get a CrawlURI.

Can this happen because of an connection problem?

thanks,
Markus
